entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance regression on wasm builds #32744
  • Reenable framework roslyn tests for 7.0.3xx branch #32737
  • `dotnet tool install`s unlisted and depreciated version #32728
  • SourceLink: Repository instance not found in cache #32714

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back legacy JS hot reload function #32738
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package (#29787) #32734
    Area-Compilers, Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2185920 #32664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32658
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32657
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix StaticWebAssets Brotli asset deduplication #32700
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers.IntegrationTests: support running with podman. #32716
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers/CreateNewImage: don't change the user to root when ContainerUser is empty. #32594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [Blazor] Support loading the Blazor WebAssembly SDK when targeting net8.0-browser #32688
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update SDK in global.json to upgrade WebAssembly tests #32687
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
